title: Red-green color blindness with 5 answer options

content.prompt: In humans, red-green color blindness is a sex-linked recessive trait. If a man and a woman produce a color-blind son, which of the following <u>must</u> be true?

choices.label: Both parents carry the allele for color blindness.
Neither parent carries the allele for color blindness.
The father carries the allele for color blindness.
The mother carries the allele for color blindness.

skill.text: 1.C: Explain biological concepts and processes in applied contexts.
